CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 17, 1962, pg. A31, reads: "$53,000 Pulse - Outfielder Roberto Clemente of the Pittsburgh Pirates didn't get the least bit excited when he signed his 1962 contract for an estimated $53,000. Clemente, leading hitter in National League last season, receives personal attention from Manager Danny Murtaugh, left, and General Manager Joe Brown."
TitMainTitle: Roberto Clemente signing his 1962 contract for the Pittsburgh Pirates baseball team, with Danny Murtaugh and Joe Brown beside him, in office
